verses.verse: Moreover the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Also, thou son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> unto the land <WH127> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; An end <WH7093>, the end <WH7093> is come <WH935> <WH8804> upon the four <WH702> corners <WH3671> of the land <WH776>.

Now is the end <WH7093> come upon thee, and I will send <WH7971> <WH8765> mine anger <WH639> upon thee, and will judge <WH8199> <WH8804> thee according to thy ways <WH1870>, and will recompense <WH5414> <WH8804> upon thee all thine abominations <WH8441>.

And mine eye <WH5869> shall not spare <WH2347> <WH8799> thee, neither will I have pity <WH2550> <WH8799>: but I will recompense <WH5414> <WH8799> thy ways <WH1870> upon thee, and thine abominations <WH8441> shall be in the midst <WH8432> of thee: and ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.
Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; An evil <WH7451>, an only <WH259> evil <WH7451>, behold, is come <WH935> <WH8802>.
An end <WH7093> is come <WH935> <WH8804>, the end <WH7093> is come <WH935> <WH8804>: it watcheth <WH6974> <WH8689> for thee; behold, it is come <WH935> <WH8802>.

The morning <WH6843> is come <WH935> <WH8804> unto thee, O thou that dwellest <WH3427> <WH8802> in the land <WH776>: the time <WH6256> is come <WH935> <WH8804> <WH8676> <WH935> <WH8802>, the day <WH3117> of trouble <WH4103> is near <WH7138>, and not the sounding again <WH1906> of the mountains <WH2022>.

Now will I shortly <WH7138> pour out <WH8210> <WH8799> my fury <WH2534> upon thee, and accomplish <WH3615> <WH8765> mine anger <WH639> upon thee: and I will judge <WH8199> <WH8804> thee according to thy ways <WH1870>, and will recompense <WH5414> <WH8804> thee for all thine abominations <WH8441>.

And mine eye <WH5869> shall not spare <WH2347> <WH8799>, neither will I have pity <WH2550> <WH8799>: I will recompense <WH5414> <WH8799> thee according to thy ways <WH1870> and thine abominations <WH8441> that are in the midst <WH8432> of thee; and ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068> that smiteth <WH5221> <WH8688>.

Behold the day <WH3117>, behold, it is come <WH935> <WH8802>: the morning <WH6843> is gone forth <WH3318> <WH8804>; the rod <WH4294> hath blossomed <WH6692> <WH8804>, pride <WH2087> hath budded <WH6524> <WH8804>.

Violence <WH2555> is risen up <WH6965> <WH8804> into a rod <WH4294> of wickedness <WH7562>: none of them shall remain, nor of their multitude <WH1995>, nor of any <WH1991> of theirs: neither shall there be wailing <WH5089> for them.

The time <WH6256> is come <WH935> <WH8804>, the day <WH3117> draweth near <WH5060> <WH8689>: let not the buyer <WH7069> <WH8802> rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799>, nor the seller <WH4376> <WH8802> mourn <WH56> <WH8691>: for wrath <WH2740> is upon all the multitude <WH1995> thereof.

For the seller <WH4376> <WH8802> shall not return <WH7725> <WH8799> to that which is sold <WH4465>, although they were yet alive <WH2416>: for the vision <WH2377> is touching the whole multitude <WH1995> thereof, which shall not return <WH7725> <WH8799>; neither shall any <WH376> strengthen <WH2388> <WH8691> himself in the iniquity <WH5771> of his life <WH2416>.

They have blown <WH8628> <WH8804> the shofar <WH8619>, even to make all ready <WH3559> <WH8687>; but none goeth <WH1980> <WH8802> to the battle <WH4421>: for my wrath <WH2740> is upon all the multitude <WH1995> thereof.

The sword <WH2719> is without <WH2351>, and the pestilence <WH1698> and the famine <WH7458> within <WH1004>: he that is in the field <WH7704> shall die <WH4191> <WH8799> with the sword <WH2719>; and he that is in the city <WH5892>, famine <WH7458> and pestilence <WH1698> shall devour <WH398> <WH8799> him.

But they that escape <WH6403> <WH8804> of them shall escape <WH6412>, and shall be on the mountains <WH2022> like doves <WH3123> of the valleys <WH1516>, all of them mourning <WH1993> <WH8802>, every one <WH376> for his iniquity <WH5771>.
All hands <WH3027> shall be feeble <WH7503> <WH8799>, and all knees <WH1290> shall be weak <WH3212> <WH8799> as water <WH4325>.

They shall also gird <WH2296> <WH8804> themselves with sackcloth <WH8242>, and horror <WH6427> shall cover <WH3680> <WH8765> them; and shame <WH955> shall be upon all faces <WH6440>, and baldness <WH7144> upon all their heads <WH7218>.

They shall cast <WH7993> <WH8686> their silver <WH3701> in the streets <WH2351>, and their gold <WH2091> shall be removed <WH5079>: their silver <WH3701> and their gold <WH2091> shall not be able <WH3201> <WH8799> to deliver <WH5337> <WH8687> them in the day <WH3117> of the wrath <WH5678> of the YY <WH3068>: they shall not satisfy <WH7646> <WH8762> their souls <WH5315>, neither fill <WH4390> <WH8762> their bowels <WH4578>: because it is the stumblingblock <WH4383> of their iniquity <WH5771>.

As for the beauty <WH6643> of his ornament <WH5716>, he set <WH7760> <WH8804> it in majesty <WH1347>: but they made <WH6213> <WH8804> the images <WH6754> of their abominations <WH8441> and of their detestable things <WH8251> therein: therefore have I set <WH5414> <WH8804> it far <WH5079> from them.

And I will give <WH5414> <WH8804> it into the hands <WH3027> of the strangers <WH2114> <WH8801> for a prey <WH957>, and to the wicked <WH7563> of the earth <WH776> for a spoil <WH7998>; and they shall pollute <WH2490> <WH8765> it.

My face <WH6440> will I turn <WH5437> <WH8689> also from them, and they shall pollute <WH2490> <WH8765> my secret <WH6845> <WH8803> place: for the robbers <WH6530> shall enter <WH935> <WH8804> into it, and defile <WH2490> <WH8765> it.
Make <WH6213> <WH8798> a chain <WH7569>: for the land <WH776> is full <WH4390> <WH8804> of bloody <WH1818> crimes <WH4941>, and the city <WH5892> is full <WH4390> <WH8804> of violence <WH2555>.

Wherefore I will bring <WH935> <WH8689> the worst <WH7451> of the heathen <WH1471>, and they shall possess <WH3423> <WH8804> their houses <WH1004>: I will also make the pomp <WH1347> of the strong <WH5794> to cease <WH7673> <WH8689>; and their holy places <WH6942> <WH8764> shall be defiled <WH2490> <WH8738> <WH8676> <WH5157> <WH8765>.
Destruction <WH7089> cometh <WH935> <WH8804>; and they shall seek <WH1245> <WH8765> peace <WH7965>, and there shall be none.

Mischief <WH1943> shall come <WH935> <WH8799> upon mischief <WH1943>, and rumour <WH8052> shall be upon rumour <WH8052>; then shall they seek <WH1245> <WH8765> a vision <WH2377> of the prophet <WH5030>; but the Torah <WH8451> shall perish <WH6> <WH8799> from the Kohen <WH3548>, and counsel <WH6098> from the ancients <WH2205>.

The king <WH4428> shall mourn <WH56> <WH8691>, and the prince <WH5387> shall be clothed <WH3847> <WH8799> with desolation <WH8077>, and the hands <WH3027> of the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> shall be troubled <WH926> <WH8735>: I will do <WH6213> <WH8799> unto them after their way <WH1870>, and according to their deserts <WH4941> will I judge <WH8199> <WH8799> them; and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.
